Name: Godless tower
About the game: Introduction: Recently, a powerful and terrible evil spirit was found in an area. The folk exorcism organization organized a crusade. You want to join the Crusade team, but before that, you need to Take part in a trial. You can join the Crusade team only after passing the trial. Now you are ready to accept the trial. Gameplay: The game is a 3D action game, which uses skills and props reasonably to defeat the enemies in the trial scene. In the game, you will play a person participating in the trial, move with W, a, s and D, and control the viewing angle with the mouse. Each level has an enemy as your opponent, and the character has four skills. The game has special mechanisms. Being familiar with these mechanisms will be the key to your victory. This game includes mild terror, action, shooting and so on. features: Third person action games, unique skills and powerful enemies. Unique game rules and interesting playing methods. Stimulate the intense game experience. Support for windows
